ai-patthana18.22:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
ai-patthana18.22:1.1_0: Because of the support for the thought that relies on the support for the sake of a thought.
ai-patthana18.22:2.1_0: Nor do you rely on the support for the sake of thought that gives rise to the cause.
ai-patthana18.22:2.1_1: Nor do you rely on the support for the sake of thought that gives rise to the cause.
ai-patthana18.22:2.1_2: Nor do you take pleasure in the support of the thought that gives rise to the support. for the sake of stilling is a condition for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana18.22:3.1_0: Because of their mind is not bound for the thought.
ai-patthana18.22:4.1_0: Not knowing the thought that the mind is not the cause, conditioned by mind.
ai-patthana18.22:5.1_0: Because of the mental stresses don’t arise for the sake of purification.
ai-patthana18.22:6.1_0: Patience doesn’t give rise to mental phenomena.
ai-patthana18.22:7.1_0: Being committed to the mind, the principle not to arise because of mental processes.
ai-patthana18.22:8.1_0: Three on taking pleasure, relying on one side, the three supports ...
ai-patthana18.22:9.1_0: Because of his mind is not surveyed the teaching for the sake of the mind.
ai-patthana18.22:10.1_0: Three on taking pleasure, relying on one side, the three supports ...
ai-patthana18.22:11.1_0: causes and conditions that give rise to mind. Since doesn’t arise because of the mind.
ai-patthana18.22:13.1_0: Because of the mind you can’t cause the reason for the sake of your mind.
ai-patthana18.22:15.1_0: Or causes and reasons don’t cause the underlying tendency to the mind.
ai-patthana18.22:17.1_0: There is a cause of the mind that gives rise to the thought, not for the sake of purification of mind.
ai-patthana18.22:19.1_0: There is a cause of the mind that arises conditioned by mind. Being attached, not for the sake of a mind.
ai-patthana18.22:23.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of outsiders.
ai-patthana18.22:24.1_0: In order to cause or condition for the sake of causes and conditions.
ai-patthana18.22:25.1_0: Because of not seeing the cause, the reason for the sake of sight, not for the sake of a cause.
ai-patthana18.22:26.1_0: Not knowingly seeing the cause, not a reason for the sake of a cause, not a reason.
ai-patthana18.22:27.1_0: There is no way for the sake of an external teaching, not for the sake of perceptions.
ai-patthana18.22:28.1_0: There is no way of speaking in accordance with the Teaching. It doesn’t give rise to one thing.
ai-patthana18.22:29.1_0: Neither that doesn’t give rise to confidence in an external teaching. It does not give rise to one thing.
ai-patthana18.22:30.1_0: Neither thought nor appropriate for the sake of internal ill will, but a cause or reason.
